name: Fadhal Shulhan.
title: Software Engineer & UI/UX Designer
description: Full Stack Software Engineer and UI/UX Researcher & Designer with expertise in front-end, back-end, and mobile development, delivering impactful digital solutions. Transitioned to full-stack development through Hacktiv8 bootcamp after 5 years as a UI/UX designer and researcher, crafting user-centered, end-to-end product designs for e-commerce, marketplace, health-tech, and fintech. Proficient in financial integrations, secure payment systems, and scalable design systems, achieving app ratings of 4.5+ and high user satisfaction. Holds a Bachelor of Science in Information Systems.

Hello, I’m Fadhal Shulhan, a Full Stack Software Engineer and UI/UX Researcher & Designer with a Bachelor of Science in Information Systems from Universitas Multimedia Nusantara, graduating with a GPA of 3.37/4.00.

With over 5 years of experience in end-to-end product design and user research, I specialize in prototyping, usability testing, and scalable design systems, complemented by expertise in front-end, back-end, and mobile development through Hacktiv8 bootcamp.

I’m passionate about crafting inclusive, user-centric digital solutions for industries such as e-commerce, marketplace, health-tech, fintech, and travel, consistently achieving app ratings of 4.5+ and ‘Highly Satisfactory’ user satisfaction scores.
Skilled in problem-solving, collaboration, and financial integrations, I thrive in both team-based and independent settings while delivering impactful digital experiences.
I enjoy exploring design trends, experimenting with programming to enhance user experiences, and staying active through gym workouts, running, and gaming.
skills: Front-End Development: HTML5, CSS3, React.js, Next.js, Vite, Redux, Axios, Socket.io, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, Firebase, Apollo Client, Deployment Client

Back-End Development: Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Supabase, Redis, Sequelize, RESTful API, GraphQL, Apollo Server, JWT, Amazon EC2, Google Cloud CE, Docker, Deployment Server, Domain Pointing, SSL, Cloudflare DNS
Mobile Development: React Native, Apollo, GraphQL, Expo
GIT & CI/CD Version Control: Git, GitHub, GitLab
Research Skills: Qualitative and Quantitative Analysis, User Interviews, Surveys, Usability Testing, A/B Testing, Competitive Analysis, Web Analytics
Research Tools: Useberry, Maze, Microsoft Clarity, Hotjar, Google Analytics, SurveyMonkey, Typeform, Google Sheet, Google Meet, Trello, JIRA, Google Form
Design Skills: Visual Design, Wireframing, Prototyping, User Journey Mapping, User Flows, Illustrations, Microinteraction Animations, Motion Graphics
Design Tools: Figma, Adobe XD, LottieFiles, Adobe After Effects
